name: Flat Design for STS
description: Flat Design Style for Steam Translation Server Compatible with STS Helper script Click Here for More Screenshots Also, check out my new Modern Steam UI for STS style: Here Contact me on: Steam
additional_info: Latest major changes: November 29th, 2018 - - Replace TH Sarabun New with Sarabun What's new: - Flat design themed of the entire STS web pages. - Move navigation bar to be fixed on the top of web pages. - Option to change default fonts to Roboto family for Latin and Sarabun family for Thai. - New styles for inputs, buttons, anchors, etc. - New effects and animation for anchor objects on hovering and focusing. - Icons for the Most Outdated and Untranslated string lists. (Thanks to Manfre for this source code) and much more.
